Node.definition: = action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

Node.gloss: to wrap|to bandage|to tie|to bind up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans wrap something around an inanimate object
= to cause to be healthy, strong, and/or prosperous

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to be established; hence: = state in which information can be trusted
= action by which humans, deities, plants, or objects leave or emerge from a certain place or position
= water that has fallen as rain
= rain that falls during the first half of April, before the harvest; ► provides the moisture that is crucial for the grains to mature; ≈ regarded as a blessing from YHWH
= causative process by which a place is made moist by rainwater

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility
= process by which an object vanishes from existence
= causative action by which deities cause non physical hurt to humans, ◄ as if cutting them with a sharp implement
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= action by which humans or deities carry out a verdict pronounced against an individual or group

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
literally: to go out; hence: = process by which an event starts taking place, originating from a certain deity, person, or place

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
literally: knowing (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality|= first man; ◄ created by God; ► husband of Eve (חַוָּה) father of Cain (קַיִן) Abel (הֶבֶל) and Seth (שֵׁת)|= town; ◄ located near the river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) near Zarethan (צָרְתָן)|= town; ◄ located near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) ► destroyed with Sodom (סְדֹם) and Gomorrah (עֲמֹרָה)
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

Node.gloss: to act unfaithfully|to be treacherous|to deal treacherously|to break faith|to betray
Node.definition: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

Node.gloss: to defer action|to wait|to lie in wait|to delay|to hesitate|to long
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities consciously remain in a particular state

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= state of being associated with other people for a common purpose
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) as a town of refuge
literally: plan; hence: = a state of moral and ethical corruption, starting with evil plans and resulting in depraved practices, ≈ regarded as foolishness

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which events are so unacceptable that they inspire horror and outrage and call for punishment
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

= process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
